Localization.Name: Joker Engineering
Localization.Description: From the mind of underground engineer Barlowe Elias, Joker Engineering is here to push the boundaries of tech, the foundations of civilization with their wild products.

English.Name: Joker Engineering
English.Description: From the mind of underground engineer Barlowe Elias, Joker Engineering is here to push the boundaries of tech, the foundations of civilization with their wild products.

Localization.Name: Suckerpunch-L Cannon
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: Joker Engineering
Item Type: Distortion Cannon
Size: 2

Silently strike from afar with the Suckerpunch. Joker's long-range size two distortion cannon drains a target's power system, leaving them helpless to defend against what you have planned next. An ideal choice for law enforcement, bounty hunters, and other non-lethal operations.
